author: Born free
message: This government has long since been infiltrated by the Mafia hence Gangster State. The Mafia have played a role in all SOEs they form part of the government. Load Shedding has begun.. lights are out.. here we go 游뗻 KZN I think the poor could and would profit if it were not for the looting. @Spykerhond Are you suggesting we pay more for electricity? Western power has nothing to do with the take-down of this country.. but the powers that be in this country. @ Spykerhond.. I know what I pay So those of us that pay for electricity will subsidise the masses who don't pay. I am tired of subsidising others my family comes first. When the electricity comes on I will send them to you. @Spykerhond. Privatisation Spykerhond.. you are referring to Pay as you use. There are too many Chiefs and not enough Indians. Far too many CEOs and Executives that do nothing. Gupta Mafia Zuma enabled the Gupta Mafia and Watson Mafia to infiltrate the government Then Zuma is and was the enemy of the people Only because the ANC hide all the money they have looted in British. The Queen has no say in politics or governance Spykerhond pkease explain what you mean.. Mugabe destabilized.. the Chinese removed him very silently. Yes it is true the British were turncoats Trump has and will save America from certain doom. Spykerhond.. I Roger that 游녨 I support Trump It will be the Awakening of Europe.. it is happening now. Trump is anti non English I can't say I have much respect for the leadership of Germany 游뱎游뱎游뱎游뱎游뱎 I am related to Barry but I love Trump
